page.title: 17WINFRITH VILLAGE SCHOOL 2
page.content: We have found the old log books of the school dating from January,1872 and have discovered that some of our activities are quite similar.Many children still live on farms but no longer have days away from school to look after the animals and crops.There used to be more than twice as many children on role a hundred years ago.In 1852 the population of the village was 1101,in 1952 it was 586.At present it is estimated to be 800. We have many activities at the school including Swimming Galas,Open and Sports Days in the Summer.Many parents come into school to help us with reading,the computer,music,craftwork and football.We visit the theatre, farms ,beaches and many other interest ing places.There is an active Parents and Teachers association.
